I liked Lust of the Dead 3. Who else but the Japanese could think of zombie men with mutated cocks raping women. And when they cum, they shoot out acid that kills the woman. The only problem I had with this flick is that it's very low budget, which means the special F/X look hooky.
Loads of fun! Good wholesome gore as on the Japanese can do it!

If you are into the Japanese erotic/comedy/horror you will like it. If you aren't accustom to that genre then you will just think it's soft core porn with a bad plot. I would like to describe it better and in depth for you but Amazon keeps rejecting my more in depth review for you.
This movie delivers what is expected to deliver  great  fun and b movie sleaze

This is my favorite of the 3 (or more by now) Lust of the Dead movies. It is fun and sometimes funny, especially if you know a bit about Japanese culture. Men have been turned into rape zombies by some mysterious radiation and the only way to kill them is to shoot their equipment off, also if they implant their sperm into a woman it is toxic and she will die. There are a few men who have not turned into zombies, one who has somehow reached 'enlightenment', a married man who is in a sexless marriage and the Otaku who are fans of Momoko the Maid. This movie pokes fun at Otaku, Japanese culture, and the West among other things. This is soft porn with humour thrown in. The ending is amazing, I won't describe it, it you see it you will know. This is a low budget B movie so don't expect the lavish sets of Cleoptra or Oscar winning movies like Ben-Hur. It is what it is and doesn't pretend to be anything else. If you are a fan of Japanese, Zombie, or B movies  this is worth a look.
another of the you get what you get

I like this but it is really an adult film.  I thought it was funny and I love zombie movies.  I like watching movies from other countries because it really let's you appreciate the differences in our cultures.
Not what I thought it would be like, was looking for more of a Zombie movie

The series continues with soft core zombie rape porn. The beginning is the same as in #2 plus they add scenes from #2 with no coherent explanation as if one was needed. In this episode the rapist men invade the woman's compound. The film leaves itself open for a part 4.

Plenty of rape, sex, nudity, and some girl/girl action.  About an hour long.
